trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Inserting" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Updating" />, and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Deleting" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona datos para los eventos <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Inserting" />, <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Updating" /> y <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Deleting" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" /> used by the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext" /> que el origen de datos usa.

trans-unit.source: The object context used by the data source.
trans-unit.target: Contexto de objeto que el origen de datos usa.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object being added, modified, or updated.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto que se va a agregar, modificar o actualizar.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the entity.
Gets the exception that was thrown while the data was being validated before the insert, update, or delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la excepción que se produjo mientras se validaban los datos antes de la operación de inserción, actualización o eliminación.

trans-unit.source: The exception, if an error occurred; otherwise, a <see langword="null" /> reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Es la excepción, si se produjo un error; de lo contrario, es una referencia <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the exception was handled and that it should not be thrown again.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si se controló la excepción y que no se debería iniciar de nuevo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the exception was handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se controló la excepción; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.
